metadata.description: The post-apocalyptic Dungeons & Dragons setting gets its first ever comic! Beneath a crimson sun lie wastelands of majestic desolation and cities of cruel splendor where life hangs by a thread. Welcome to Athas! In Part 1 of "Ianto's Tomb," a runaway gladiator and part-time slave hunter cross swords, forever entwining their fates on this savage desert planet.
metadata.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Sun
